content: and bottom starting in the top left corner of the front single_crochet in each single_crochet 2 single_crochet in each chain-2 space single_crochet in each double_crochet across top of front join to first single_crochet with a slip_stitch fasten_off repeat for back crochet over ends as much as possible weave in any remaining loose ends this pattern is the property of relynn johnson and may not be distributed copied or sold without written permission all items made from this pattern may not be sold without written consent finishing measure the width of the purse at the bottom and add 1 inch 1/2 inch seam allowance on both sides for your total width measurement measure bag from the top corner of a side gusset down the length of the gusset around the bottom of the gusset and back up the opposite side of the gusset add 1 inch to this measurement and that is your total length measurement cut fabric to match your total width and total length measurements fold lining in half with right sides together and sew both sides leaving the top of the lining open fold down a ½ inch allowance around the top and press sew zipper or closure of choice to purse sew lining into purse attach straps if you find any errors or have questions please email me at relynn d johnson@gmail com this pattern is the property of relynn johnson and may not be distributed copied or sold without written permission all items made from this pattern may not be sold without written consent
